author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Block elements can now report if they are supposed to be nested or not.
This will be used by the root parser for nesting blocks properly.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added check in doc comment parser for a typical mistake which involves a
# e.g. {*/section*/}, this should will give an error to the user.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added support for limiting text of new cursor in cursorAt() and added API doc.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Incorrect variable was used for grammar description.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Made sure all errors are reported in unit test runner, even E_STRICT.
